mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS_T ( BBS_NO , CONTENTS , USER_NO , CREATE_DT , STATE , DEPTH , GROUP_NO , GROUP_ORDER ) VALUES ( BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{contents} , #{user.userNo} , CURRENT_DATE , 1 , 0 , BBS_SEQ.CURRVAL , 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT BBS_NO, CONTENTS, USER_NO, EMAIL, CREATE_DT, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORDER FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, GROUP_ORDER ASC) AS RN, B.BBS_NO, B.CONTENTS, U.USER_NO, U.EMAIL, B.CREATE_DT, B.STATE, B.DEPTH, B.GROUP_NO, B.GROUP_ORDER FROM USER_T U INNER JOIN BBS_T B ON U.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_T U INNER JOIN BBS_T B ON U.USER_NO = B.USER_NO WHERE ${column} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT BBS_NO, CONTENTS, USER_NO, EMAIL, CREATE_DT, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORDER FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, GROUP_ORDER ASC) AS RN, B.BBS_NO, B.CONTENTS, U.USER_NO, U.EMAIL, B.CREATE_DT, B.STATE, B.DEPTH, B.GROUP_NO, B.GROUP_ORDER FROM USER_T U INNER JOIN BBS_T B ON U.USER_NO = B.USER_NO WHERE ${column} LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{query}), '%')) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
